ReviewList.Text: The second edition of this book has more of everything in it! The solutions to all of the homework in the 4th edition of "Introduction to Health Physics" are given in a step by step manner that is easy to follow. Plus, I discovered that there are many problems solved using two or sometimes three different methods. This book is a great reference for health physicists or anyone studying for the CHP exam. The one problem that persists is that occasionally some answers are different from the values given in the back of the textbook, usually by a decimal, but it is only a minor annoyance. Overall a great book and CHEAP!

I have found this manual to be quite helpful.  I mean, you don't depend on it, but it is a nice check on your approach to make sure that you are going about your problems correctly.  I can recommend this for anyone using Cember in their Health Physics courses.

Health physics is quite a challenging class, i had spent days trying to figure the hw out with no help, this book really helps, shows step by step detailed work, and referes back to the book(Introduction to Health Physics 4th edition) where they used the equations from. I would highly recommend this book to anyone taking this course.
This manual arrived in excellent condition. Extremely useful reference for the health physicist and the aspiring health physicist a like.
Very helpful in solving health physics problems!  This supplement to the Intro to Health Physics is very much worth having.
Excellent and prompt service. Book was as expected.
